snippet: The art adviser has played many roles in bringing the two sectors together. Now a new generation is appearing, focusing on younger clients and emerging artists.
abstract: New generation of art advisers is working to bring emerging artists and designers together; Nicholas Campbell, founder of Narcissus Arts in London, is working with Alice Ashby of avant-garde knitwear label Blake London and Italian artist Ludovica Gioscia; such fashion-art collaborations were once considered radical, but now are common.
lead_paragraph: The art adviser has played many roles in bringing the two sectors together. Now a new generation is appearing, focusing on younger clients and emerging artists.

headline.main: Fashion's Bridge to the Art World
headline.print_headline: Fashion's Bridge to the Art World
